item.description:
Atheist Brunch at Christopher's in Porter, second time around.

Expect a very laid back, friendly community of disbelievers who are serious about their brunch. Catch up with existing friends or meet some new people. Make something useful of a Sunday you heathen!

This is a brunch meetup on a Sunday morning at Christopher's. Expect plenty of room to spread out and converse while making the most of hot coffee and their brunch buffet.

Definitely jump on the waiting list if you want to come! Spots always open up and we can usually work something out.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Boston Atheists or Winfield at Hostess
item.name: Atheist Brunch @ Christopher's
